articles.title: Recent Match Report - NZ Women vs ENG Women 1st T20I 2020/21 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: She took two early wickets and made an unbeaten 26 as the visitors claimed a seven-wicket win
articles.content:
England Women 99 for 3 (Wyatt 33, Sciver 26*, Kasperek 2-24) beat New Zealand Women 96 (Martin 36, Glenn 2-11, Brunt 2-13, Ecclestone 2-18, Sciver 2-28) by seven wickets
